page.title: 19Hollies Conservation Area.
page.content: The controversial Hollies childrens home site in Halfway street, Sidcup is now a{conservation area. Southwark council, the owners will put the 50 acre site up for sale by tender in the autumn '85. Any{development}by new owners will be restricted due to the conservation laws:{ {*}Permission is now needed from Bexley if new owners Wish to demolish existing buildings.{*}Landscapers must consult Bexley Council about any alterations to trees.{ {*}Bexley planners must devise ways of "preserving and enhancing" the land in the conservation area.{*}Any proposed developments which could alter the character of the conservation area must be publicised by Bexley so local residents may have a say.
